DisclsReportingPeriod.name: DisclsReportingPeriod
DisclsReportingPeriod.description: Represents a corporate reporting period that is used for stakeholder disclosure reports.

AffiliateAccountId.description: The account that's identified as the affiliate account.

Description.description: The description of the reporting period.

EndDate.description: The end date of the reporting period.

Identifier.description: The unique identifier of the reporting period.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

StartDate.description: The start date of the reporting period.
